00019 #define _WIN32_IE 0x0600
00020 
00021 #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN             // Exclude rarely-used stuff from Windows headers
00022 
00023 #include "resource.h"
00024 
00025 #include <winsock2.h>
00026 #include <windows.h>
00027 #include <shellapi.h>
00028 #include <stdio.h>
00029 
00030 #include "NotifyWindowClass.h"
00031 #include "Ping.h"
00032 #include "TrayIcon.h"
00033 
00034 CPing* ping;
00035 HINSTANCE myInstance;
00036 HICON m_hIconUp;
00037 HICON m_hIconDown;
00038 char pszToolTip[255] = {0};
00039 HMENU hSubMenu;
00040 TrayIcon* trayIcon;
00041 
00042 LRESULT CALLBACK About(HWND hDlg, UINT message, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
00043 {
00044         switch (message)
00045         {
00046                 case WM_INITDIALOG:
00047                                 return TRUE;
00048 
00049                 case WM_COMMAND:
00050                         if (LOWORD(wParam) == IDOK || LOWORD(wParam) == IDCANCEL) 
00051                         {
00052                                 EndDialog(hDlg, LOWORD(wParam));
00053                                 return TRUE;
00054                         }
00055                         break;
00056         }
00057     return FALSE;
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 LRESULT CALLBACK MyWindowProc(HWND hWnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
00062 {
00063         char buf[255] = {0};
00064         int num;
00065 
00066         switch (msg)
00067         {
00068         case WM_COMMAND:
00069                 switch (LOWORD(wParam))
00070                 {
00071                 case ID_TRAYMENU_QUIT:
00072                         // end program;
00073                         ping->stop();
00074                         trayIcon->remove();
00075                         DestroyWindow(hWnd);
00076                         return 0;
00077                 case ID_TRAYMENU_PINGHOST:
00078                         switch (GetMenuState(hSubMenu, ID_TRAYMENU_PINGHOST, MF_BYCOMMAND))
00079                         {
00080                         case MF_CHECKED:
00081                                 ping->stop();
00082                                 num = CheckMenuItem(hSubMenu, ID_TRAYMENU_PINGHOST, MF_BYCOMMAND | MF_UNCHECKED);
00083                                 break;
00084                         case MF_UNCHECKED:
00085                                 ping->start();
00086                                 num = CheckMenuItem(hSubMenu, ID_TRAYMENU_PINGHOST, MF_BYCOMMAND | MF_CHECKED);
00087                         default:
00088                                 break;
00089                         } 
00090                         return 0;
00091                 case ID_TRAYMENU_ABOUT:
00092                         DialogBox(myInstance, (LPCTSTR)IDD_ABOUT, hWnd, (DLGPROC)About);
00093                 default:
00094                         return DefWindowProc(hWnd, msg, wParam, lParam);
00095                 }
00096         case CPing::PING_HOST_UP:
00097         case CPing::PING_HOST_DOWN:
00098                 trayIcon->setIcon(msg == CPing::PING_HOST_UP ? m_hIconUp : m_hIconDown);
00099                 num = sprintf(buf, "Host \"%s\" is %s", ((CPing*)wParam)->getHostName(), msg == CPing::PING_HOST_UP ? "up" : "down");
00100                 trayIcon->setInfo(buf);
00101                 return 0;
00102         case WM_USER + 0x5000:
00103                 switch (LOWORD(lParam))
00104                 {
00105                 case WM_RBUTTONUP:
00106                         POINT pos;
00107                         GetCursorPos(&pos);
00108                         SetForegroundWindow(hWnd);
00109                         TrackPopupMenu(hSubMenu, 0, pos.x, pos.y, 0, hWnd, NULL);
00110                         PostMessage(hWnd, WM_NULL, 0, 0);
00111                         break;
00112                 }
00113                 return 0;
00114         case WM_DESTROY:
00115                 PostQuitMessage(0);
00116                 return 0;
00117         default:
00118                 return DefWindowProc(hWnd, msg, wParam, lParam);
00119         }
00120 }
00121 
00122 int APIENTRY WinMain(HINSTANCE hInstance,
00123                      HINSTANCE hPrevInstance,
00124                      LPSTR     lpCmdLine,
00125                      int       nCmdShow)
00126 {
00127         WSADATA wsaData;
00128         int num;
00129 
00130         // Initialise Winsock library
00131         WSAStartup(MAKEWORD(2,2), &wsaData);
00132 
00133         CNotifyWindowClass wndClass(hInstance, (WNDPROC) MyWindowProc);
00134         HWND hWnd;
00135         int bRet;
00136         MSG msg;
00137 
00138         myInstance = hInstance;
00139 
00140         if (!wndClass.registerClass())
00141         {
00142                 MessageBox(NULL, "Could not register window class for window", "Error", MB_OK);
00143                 return 1;
00144         }
00145 
00146         hWnd = CreateWindow(CNotifyWindowClass::sc_lpszClassName, "", WS_POPUP,
00147                 CW_USEDEFAULT, CW_USEDEFAULT,
00148                 CW_USEDEFAULT, CW_USEDEFAULT,
00149                 NULL, 0,
00150                 hInstance, 0);
00151 
00152         if (hWnd == NULL)
00153         {
00154                 MessageBox(NULL, "Error while creating window", "Error", MB_OK);
00155                 return 1;
00156         }
00157 
00158         m_hIconDown = ::LoadIcon(hInstance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDI_ICON_DOWN));
00159         m_hIconUp = ::LoadIcon(hInstance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDI_ICON_UP));
00160 
00161         HMENU hMenu = LoadMenu(myInstance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDR_MENU1));
00162         hSubMenu = GetSubMenu(hMenu, 0);
00163         SetMenuDefaultItem(hSubMenu, ID_TRAYMENU_QUIT, FALSE);
00164 
00165         trayIcon = new TrayIcon(hWnd, WM_USER + 0x5000);
00166 
00167         trayIcon->setIcon(m_hIconUp);
00168         trayIcon->setVersion();
00169 
00170         ping = new CPing(hWnd, lpCmdLine, true);
00171 
00172         num = sprintf(pszToolTip, "TrayAlive for host %s", ping->getHostName());
00173         trayIcon->setToolTip(pszToolTip);
00174         ping->start();
00175 
00176         while ((bRet = GetMessage(&msg, NULL, 0, 0)) != 0)
00177         {
00178                 if (bRet == -1)
00179                 {
00180                 }
00181                 else
00182                 {
00183                         TranslateMessage(&msg);
00184                         DispatchMessage(&msg);
00185                 }
00186         }
00187 
00188         delete ping;
00189 
00190         WSACleanup();
00191         return 0;
00192 }
